name: The Year Is 2048
body:
# Welcome to the Year 2048


***
***







### Authors and Contributors
This code was originally forked from the game created by [Gabriele Cirulli](http://gabrielecirulli.com/) which was based on [1024 by Veewo Studio](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/1024!/id823499224) and conceptually similar to [Threes by Asher Vollmer](http://asherv.com/threes/). This fork is designed and coded by @earoshThime.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
